entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 2:43 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: W 26 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
